item.description:
For More Info Click Here

Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

June 19, 2008- Monthly Meeting
Will Lansing - Profitable Partnerships

"Big Profits against the Credit Crunch and the Tsunami of Foreclosures! "

Are you nervous about the current market and how investors are operating with the credit crunch?

Are you unsure how to structure deals and how to make money with so much inventory available?

Are you worried about how to find good deals amidst the countless foreclosures with no equity?
5:30 - 6:30 PM - Networking and Meet the Vendors

Are you eager to build an investing business, but scared because of where the market is and where it could be heading?

Join Will Lansing for an evening of strategies, systems and tools to help you build, grow and operate your real estate investing business in this down market.

ABOUT WILL LANSING

Will Lansing is no ordinary real estate investor. After skillfully building a real estate investing empire making over $30-million a year in revenues, Will is counted as one of the nation?s top real estate deal makers and educators. Will takes a different angle than most experts in detailing and outlining the true dangers and challenges of creative real estate investing, and how one truly needs to build a business in this kind of marketplace.

In ?Big Profits Amidst the Credit Crunch and Foreclosure Tsunami ? Will walks investors through the things to watch for in a high foreclosure and tight credit marketplace. He shows investors how to build a wholesale, renovation, and buy-and-hold business when others may be ?running for the hills?. He walks investors step-by-step through the key strategies to be using in today?s sliding marketplace. He introduces the audience to the tools and systems needed to seek out the truly motivated sellers and how to take advantage of this ?opportunity rich? environment

5:30 PM - Networking
6:30 PM - Meeting

Location: Hilton Garden Inn, 420 Totten Pond Rd, Waltham, Ma
Free to Boston AREIA members (please see website for details - http://www.BostonAREI..., Visitors only $25 at the door.
